text: Melum, (ivvaru kurukinravanai nokki) ‘‘unakku oru nanmai erpattal atu allahvinal erpattatu'' enrum ‘‘unakku oru tinkerpattal atu (ni ilaitta kurrattin karanamaka) unnaltan vantatu'' (enrum kuruviraka. Napiye!) Nam um'mai oru tutarakave manitarkalukku anuppiyirukkirom. (Itarku) allahve potumana catciyaka irukkiran
